abstract.t: This document contains the GNUnet communicator specification. This document defines the normative wire format of communicator protocols, cryptographic routines and security considerations for use by implementers. This specification was developed outside the IETF and does not have IETF consensus. It is published here to inform readers about the function of GNUnet communicators, guide future communicator implementations, and ensure interoperability among implementations including with the pre-existing GNUnet implementation.
